section_title: Mastering Variables and Data Types in Python
section_description: Hands-on programming section covering Python variables, data types, and type conversion with practical exercises.
learning_objectives: Create and manipulate variables using proper naming conventions and dynamic typing principles
Apply arithmetic operations on numeric data types and convert between integer, float, and string representations
Implement string indexing, slicing, and formatting methods to process text data
Construct and modify complex data structures including lists, tuples, and dictionaries
Execute type casting operations while handling potential errors and data integrity issues

lessons.lesson_objective: Demonstrate ability to create, name, and reassign variables following Python conventions

exercises.exercise_instructions: Create five variables representing different personal attributes (name, age, height, is_student, hobbies) with appropriate values
Swap values between three variables (a, b, c) without using temporary variables, then print the results
Create a variable with an integer value, reassign it to a string, then to a list, printing the type after each assignment

lessons.lesson_objective: Apply arithmetic operations and understand differences between integers, floats, and complex numbers

exercises.exercise_instructions: Write code that takes two numbers and performs all basic arithmetic operations, storing results in appropriately typed variables
Calculate Body Mass Index using weight and height variables, then round and format the result to 2 decimal places
Convert between integer, float, and string representations of numbers, handling potential errors gracefully

lessons.lesson_objective: Construct and manipulate string variables using indexing, slicing, and built-in methods

exercises.exercise_instructions: Create a program that uses string formatting to generate personalized greetings using name, time of day, and location variables
Analyze a given string variable to count vowels, find word frequency, and extract specific substrings
Remove whitespace, convert case, and replace special characters in user-provided text using string methods

lessons.lesson_objective: Implement lists, tuples, and dictionaries while performing type casting between different data types

exercises.exercise_instructions: Create a dictionary storing student information then convert specific values to different types while maintaining data integrity
Convert a string of comma-separated values into a list, then transform elements into their appropriate data types automatically
Transform data between lists, tuples, and dictionaries, demonstrating understanding of mutable and immutable types
